task.summary: Default task
Ucitan je Datomic, sad vezbam koriscenje kroz dokumentaciju
Dodate neke default funkcije koje rade sa bazom u datomicu
Uradjene kreiraj korisnika i dodaj xp u bazi
Uradjene kreiraj korisnika i dodaj xp u bazi 2
Provezbana funkcija add-xp

transakciona funkcija koja dodaje xp useru, kreirana sema aktivnosti/event koje user izvrsava da bi dobio xp, kreirana sema tipa aktivnosti koja ima main tip aktivnosti. odvajam kod u dva paketa db i main paket, i db.clj u dva fajla schema.clj, seed.clj gde cu imati back ako mi se nesto zezne kao na primer da ubacim dva worka...

transakciona funkcija koja dodaje xp useru, kreirana sema aktivnosti/event koje user izvrsava da bi dobio xp, kreirana sema tipa aktivnosti koja ima main tip aktivnosti. odvajam kod u dva paketa db i main paket, i db.clj u dva fajla schema.clj, seed.clj gde cu imati back ako mi se nesto zezne kao na primer da ubacim dva worka...
Uh, datomic je malo naporan iskreno, ali zanimljiv jer je sve kao u clojuru. Odvojio sam scheme i seed, pohvatao sam fazon sa transakcijama, i kako se sta pise
Kreirana funkcija activity/add, sustina app, na osnovu parametara se izracuna xp za odredjenu aktivnost
Fixed add-activity-tx, user-activities -> query for finding all activities of one user
Daily activities by user - list of every activity done in one day. Daily-xp - user can be put in leaderboard to compete and compare daily activities with other people.
Daily, Weekly and Monthly activities and xp per user
Daily, Weekly and Monthly activities and xp per user
Fixing old code, erasing and moving unnecessary and outdated functions. Setting up better architecture, more readable
Testing of malli validation
Malli validation, validate! function
Validation of transaction function add-activity and create user
Leaderboard for one day, week and month
Leaderboard finito
Leaderboard finito 2, merged daily, weekly, monthly leaderboard function in one function, all time leaderboard is still by itself

Leaderboard finito 3, i merged even all-time in default leaderboard fn, so now code is clearer and less messy. Deleted unnecessary fucntion i no longer use. Added 3 tests for 2 for adding activity and 1 for leaderboard.
API preparing for frontend, did some validation
Leaderboard with rank and ties in xp
Leaderboard delta, calculate changes in rank
Leaderboard delta still
Leaderboard delta test, edge case -> when new user is added, how he evaluate, I failed today, it needs fix tomorrow.
Leaderboard delta test, edge case -> when new user is added, how he evaluate, Fixed, problem was in test data
Change to clojure.test, done 2 tests
Front end using htmx with hiccup.Using ring for web server and metosin reitit for routes/ with hiccup. Server is up, and most basic leaderboard is shown.
Practicing htmx basics
Practicing htmx basics 2
Day picker and 24h planner
Formated code, instagram sidebar
